# awesome-wrap



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Shadow Parts

| Part      | Description                                                |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"inner"` | The inner container element that wraps all child elements. |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                        | Description                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-lg`              | The view breakpoint for lg. (Default: 960)                                                            |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-md`              | The view breakpoint for md. (Default: 720)                                                            |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-sm`              | The view breakpoint for sm. (Default: 540)                                                            |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xl`              | The view breakpoint for xl. (Default: 1140)                                                           |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xs`              | The view breakpoint for xs. (Default: 0)                                                              |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xxl`             | The view breakpoint for xxl. (Default: 1320)                                                          |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-lg`        | The inner breakpoint of lg. (Default to the value of `--awesome-view-breakpoint-lg` with unit `px`)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-md`        | The inner breakpoint of md. (Default to the value of `--awesome-view-breakpoint-md` with unit `px`)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-sm`        | The inner breakpoint of sm. (Default to the value of `--awesome-view-breakpoint-sm` with unit `px`)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-xl`        | The inner breakpoint of xl. (Default to the value of `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xl` with unit `px`)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-xs`        | The inner breakpoint of xs. (Default: 100%)                                                           |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-xxl`       | The inner breakpoint of xxl. (Default to the value of `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xxl` with unit `px`) |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-lg-in-px`  | The outer breakpoint of lg. (Default: 992)                                                            |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-md-in-px`  | The outer breakpoint of md. (Default: 768)                                                            |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-sm-in-px`  | The outer breakpoint of sm. (Default: 576)                                                            |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-xl-in-px`  | The outer breakpoint of xl. (Default: 1200)                                                           |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-xs-in-px`  | The outer breakpoint of xs. (Default: 0)                                                              |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-xxl-in-px` | The outer breakpoint of xxl. (Default: 1400)                                                          |
